instructions: Go into Settings > General > Lock Screen & Security or Security & privacy > Trust agents and make sure that Smart Lock is turned on. The Trusted Agents setting might be in a slightly different place on your particular phone model. Search for Trusted Agents by tapping the magnifying glass at the top of the Settings screen to find it. Then, still under the Security settings, search for Smart Lock . Tap Smart Lock and enter your password, unlock pattern, or pin code, or use your fingerprint. From here, you can enable On-body detection , add Trusted places and Trusted devices , and set up Voice Match . Once you've set up Smart Lock, you'll see a pulsing circle at the bottom of your lock screen, around the lock symbol.
